body.name: Nuwave Bravo 12-in-1 Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo, Airfryer Convection Oven Countertop, 1800 Watts, 21-Qt Capacity, 50°-450°F Temp Controls, 65 Recipes & 4 Accessories, Silver- Stainless Steel
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 30 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 15 mins
features: MAKE ADJUSTMENTS ON-THE-FLY – Want hotter temperature or need to cook it longer? Simply adjust on-the-fly any time. Fine-tune time and temperature any time in the cooking process. Bravo’s intuitive digital controls are easy to operate.

INTUITIVE DIGITAL CONTROLS - Set cook temperatures from 50°F to 450°F adjustable in precise 5°F increments. Unlike the primitive methods that regulate temperature by turning the heater on and off, our heater never turns off while cooking.

HIGH EFFICIENCY 1800 WATTS – Bravo is rated at 1800 Watts. Despite its compact size, it is a seriously powerful cooking appliance. Bravo is also highly efficient. It heats up quickly and cooks faster than most convection ovens.

HEALTHY, NUTRITIOUS MEALS – Bravo’s intense heating process ensures that most of the unhealthy, high-calorie fats and oils drip off during cooking leaving food more nutritious, flavorful, and moist with its own natural juices intact.
DUAL HEAT SURROUND COOKING - Customize the top and bottom heaters and convection fan independently for true surround cooking. Each of the heaters - top and bottom - are adjustable from 0% to 100%.
PERFECT PIZZA - To bake a perfect pizza, set bottom heaters at full power & top heaters at 30% for crispy crunch crust and perfectly melted cheesy toppings. Bravo accommodates up to 12-inch pizzas.

MULTI-LAYER COOKING - With 2 rack positions and multi-purpose racks, multi-layer cooking is more convenient than ever before. Bravo’s heavy-duty racks can withstand loads over 30 pounds. Cooking delicious meals for the entire family is now easy.

12 PRE-PROGRAMMED PRESETS - Bravo is programmed with 12 preset cooking functions for air frying, grilling, baking, broiling, roasting, dehydrating, reheating, toasting & more. Simply select the right preset function and let Bravo to do the rest.

LINEAR THERMAL (LINEAR T) TECHNOLOGY – Linear T executes the set temp accurately throughout the cooking process by continuously monitoring temp fluctuations & making constant adjustments every second to maintain the set temp to ensure perfect results.

WHAT’S INCLUDED – Bravo Digital Toaster Oven comes with 1 heavy-duty cooking rack; 1 baking pan and rack; 1 removable crumb tray; 12”x9.5” air fry basket; 1 owner’s manual, 1 quick start guide, and 1 recipe book.

productInformation.value: #10,094 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #14 in Convection Ovens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought one for myself this summer and gave this updated model to my parents for Christmas. They are thrilled! My mom is relearning to walk after an illness and my stepfather has been most of the cooking and taking care of her. My reason, personally, that I say it changed my life is that I rarely use the oven anymore. My husband and I use this to air fry chicken breasts. Without looking at the directions too closely, I evoo'd, s&p'd, herbed the chicken breasts, hit start and in 15 minutes (no preheat), flat, we had the most amazing, juiciest, flavorful chicken breast we have ever had. I am a great cook, but in order for my chicken to be that juicy and tasty, I would use a vat of chicken broth or the like and have to baste them in the oven. Between the time, the cookware cleanup, and the good - but not THIS good! - chicken, this air fryer has changed my life! Besides that, I don't need to make or buy chicken stock or bone broth to baste my chicken anymore or let my chicken cook in its own fat.We have also used it to heat up pizza, Jamaican patties, tortillas, pita, frozen Brussel sprouts, reheat any veggie actually, potato fries, a chimichanga once - just a lot of things I would usually end up throwing away.The cleanup is way too easy without the parchment insert if you decide to not purchase them. I didn't know that was a thing, so it took a few months to start using a parchment liner, but it still cleaned super easily. Better with parchment, and you can also use regular non-formed parchment paper, to save money.My stepdad is really thrilled with it. It saves him from back ache from opening or shutting the oven door, he will be able to clean it easily, cook healthier to help with his blood pressure and cut down on a lot of work that would otherwise take time away he would rather spend with Mom. I highly recommend this NuWave air fryer. It is SO EASY!! It's brilliant. Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this air fryer when our 1st one broke.
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Comes with a recipe book. This book helps with trying new ways to cook other than on the stove top or oven. Helps to keep your house ftom getting hot in the summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When choosing an air fryer I wanted something that could cook steaks. This thing can and it does a really good job at it.It does a good job at everything, it is super versatile. Workhorse I use everyday for past year. Highly recommend.It does not produce smoke like others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a real energy saver
reviews.reviewText: As the single father of a 12 yo daughter, "acceptable" suppers often involve things like popcorn shrimp, french fries, chicken nuggets [as a farmer I'm still trying to figure out how they get those "nuggets" off the chickens], and similar breaded foods.I really dislike actual deep-frying because the oil smokes and spatters, and is a real pain in the ass to dispose of. My alternative has been to use the oven for baking the frozen products, but it bothered me to fire up the oven for 10 nuggets and a handful of fries. From late spring to early fall it also throws a lot of unwanted heat into the house.This air fryer is not only faster than oil or a conventional over, but also far easier to clean than oil and throws off less heat than the oven. Basically, it's a mini convection oven ideal for small batches. Since I bought it last spring my gas bill is down by 5 bucks a month during a season when the furnace is off.This is a large model costing about $120, so the gas savings pay for it in 24 months. After decades in business, I consider any capital purchase covered by two years' identifiable expense reduction to be pretty much a no brainer.This one sure is. Faster and cleaner are fine bonuses, too. In most circumstances it will be money well spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was my third air fryer and my largest yet. Easy to use, easy to clean and food taste great. Would recommend product & seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great
reviews.reviewText: There are alot of things you can do with this AF but I haven’t figured them all out yet. I love the meat thermometer function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as Advertised
reviews.reviewText: I love this air fryer! It heats up quickly, is big enough for enough food for about one or two people, and is a much better way to heat food that tends to get soggy in the microwave. I've cooked frozen fries, onion rings, chicken tenders, reheated fried chicken, mozzarella sticks, and made quesadillas. They were all fantastic and ready in about ten minutes. I can't believe I've waited so long to get one. Purchase this now! You won't regret it

I have owned his model for just over a year, I really like this air fryer but recently the display quit working. I called customer service and told them what happened and a few days later I had a new cooking base. Because of the way NuWave handled my concerns and warranty claim I would not hesitate to purchase products from this company.

reviews.reviewTitle: LOVE LOVE AND LOVE this airfryer
reviews.reviewText: The basket is a large size and holds a great deal of food. There's even grilling accessories "for steaks" that can be purchased.Now that I have used the airfryer several times and I am now familiar with how it works etc, , I find it very easy to use. I love having the removable base in the basket as it makes cleanup that much easier.Can't believe how delicious things like wings turn out. I am so happy with this machine.😊👍

reviews.reviewTitle: Wifey Finally Started Trying Out Frying Thanks to This!
reviews.reviewText: So normally, I'm the one cooking.\When we got the NuWave, my wife got super excited to the point that she took over cooking (for now) LOLShe made chicken wings and fries. The chicken wings came right from the freezer (not even thawed). She just added salt and pepper as soon as it came out. Crispy and tasted great - can't complain.
when you take the basket out, remember the outer case is HOT

Bought the product in July, 2021 and started to have problems in mid October 2021, Now it does not work at all. When trying to preheat or cook the whole thing just shuts down! It's extremely frustrated to have spent this money for such a low quality, unreliable machine with extremely limited warranty - only one month warranty for refund and and limited 3 month warranty ended in October 2021. DO NOT BUY THIS.
